definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to rob/to plunder/to seize by force/to coerce/calamity/abbr. for kalpa 劫波[jie2 bo1]
to loot a burning house/to profit from sb's misfortune (idiom)
to take advantage of sb's misfortune/to loot

sentences.english: Some VCs will extract harsh terms under these conditions.
sentences.chinese: 有些风投公司就会趁火打劫，提出很苛刻的条件。

sentences.english: Back on the road, he is set upon by four highwaymen.
sentences.chinese: 回到路上，他被四个人拦路打劫。

sentences.english: If rich people buy food abuse, that and no difference also fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 如果有钱人买粮食糟蹋，那和趁火打劫也没有差别。

sentences.english: A few months later Kevin attempted to rob a bank.
sentences.chinese: 几个月之后，凯文企图打劫银行。

sentences.english: The rebels went looting and pillaging.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱者趁火打劫，掠夺财物。

sentences.english: They were told to shoot looters on sight.
sentences.chinese: 他们奉令见到打劫者立即射击。

sentences.english: A group of XiangMa robbed tang wall management of the city.
sentences.chinese: 一伙响马打劫了唐壁管理的城市。

sentences.english: Two teenagers are preparing to mug a man as he comes out of a bar.
sentences.chinese: 两个少年准备去打劫一个正从酒吧出来的男人。

sentences.english: In Berlin, Soviet forces did their share of plundering.
sentences.chinese: 在柏林，苏军士兵也加入了打劫。

sentences.english: It was the very same house they had attempted to rob.
sentences.chinese: 这正是他们企图打劫的那户人家。

sentences.english: With no money to lay out he intends to rob the drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 因为没有钱支付交易，他有意打劫毒品卖家。

sentences.english: After the hold-up , the gang made their getaway in a stolen car.
sentences.chinese: 匪徒们打劫后，乘一辆盗来的汽车逃走了。

sentences.english: Today, I was robbed by a guy wearing a ninja turtle costume.
sentences.chinese: 娘的，我今天被一个穿着忍者龟服装的人给打劫了。

sentences.english: So the words of an 18-year-old looter should come as no surprise.
sentences.chinese: 所以一位18岁的打劫者所说的就一点儿也不惊讶了。

sentences.english: Haiti's prime minister recently said that child traffickers are  targeting the scores of children now on their own in Port au Prince.
sentences.chinese: 海地总理最近称人贩正趁火打劫贩卖太子港孤儿。
历史上第一次坦克打劫案。

definition: (of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
to break into a house for robbery (idiom)
to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
to loot a burning house/to profit from sb's misfortune (idiom)
